description:
In this course you will learn the methods I use for my paying local business clients to consistently achieve page one Google search results using YouTube videos! Using these strategies, you can achieve the same type of results that my clients have paid me thousands of dollars to achieve.

This course is broken down into simple to follow modules where I take you along side me into a real client account and teach you step by step how to make, upload, optimize, and rank in Google videos that will capture the attention of your target audience and deliver consistent traffic to your website.

This course is perfect for any business owner or individual who wants to know how to leverage YouTube to climb in the search engines with much less time and effort needed to invest that traditional SEO tactics.
title: Use YouTube to Get Your Local Business to The Top of Google
